GSP28prakp12u:0: oṃ śrīmatprabhākaragurutantradhurandhareṇa mahāmahopādhyāya-śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇapañcikā nyāyasiddhyākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣamasthalaṭipparāyā
GSP28prakp12u:8: kriyā hi kṣaṇabhaṅginī na kālāntarabhāvinassvargādessādhanāyopapadyata iti, kālāntarāvasthāyi kriyāto bhinnaṃ kāryamapūrvaṃ liṅādayo bodhayantīti
GSP28prakp12u:16: prayatna eva bhavitavye 'pūrve prayojakabhūtasya bhāvayiturātmano vyāpāra
GSP28prakp12u:18: na ca kāryābhidhānaṃ kṛtimanabhidadhatāṃ liṅādīnamupapadyata iti, te
GSP28prakp12u:20: na ca yugapadanekābhidhānaṃ doṣaḥ, tathā'vagamāt, ānuguṇyācca /
GSP28prakp12u:28: ata eva bhagavato bhāṣyakārasya tatra tatra
GSP28prakp12u:33: sarvo hi puruṣaprayatnaḥ kañcidbhāvārthamavaśyamāśrayate, tena vinā tadabhavāt /
GSP28prakp12u:36: “yatraiva1354 hi yo bhavati nānyatra, sa tasya viṣaya”iti viṣayavidaḥ /
GSP28prakp12u:38: ato bhāvya evār'tho viṣayaḥ, bhāvyasyaiva puruṣaprayatnagocaratvāt /
GSP28prakp12u:39: tena kāryābhidhāyibhissaha viṣayabodhakatayaiva bhāvārthaḥ karmaśabdassamabhivyāhāraṃ prathamamarhati,
GSP28prakp12u:42: tena na jaghanyayā sādhanatayā bhāvārthānāmapūrveṇa sahānvayaḥ /
GSP28prakp12u:46: sa ca viṣayībhūtabhāvārthāvacchinno vidhyarthaḥ kāryātmā pratītaḥ karaṇam,
GSP28prakp12u:48: tatra sa eva bhāvārtho viṣayībhūtaḥ karaṇamityavasīyate, kṛtivyāpyatvāt /
GSP28prakp12u:49: yo hi yayā kṛtyānyārthapravṛttayā viṣayīkrayate, sa eva tatra karaṇam /
GSP28prakp12u:54: nanu kathaṃ prayatnalabdhātmā bhāvārtho bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇam /
GSP28prakp12u:58: sarvāṇyeva hi kārakāṇi karttṛvyatiriktāni tadvyāpāravyāpyāni, na caitāvatā tāni karmatāṃ 1358bhajante, anīpsitatvāt /
GSP28prakp12u:64: na hi paraśuḥ karma, karaṇantu bhavati, anīpsitatvāt /
GSP28prakp12u:75: viṣayabhāvasyaikatvādekameva karaṇaṃ syāt, tataśca bhedenetikartavyatāsambandho na syāt /
GSP28prakp12u:77: yadeva viṣayībhūtam, tadeva karaṇam, nānyaditi tasyār'thaḥ /
GSP28prakp12u:81: ata stantrābhidhānātsahitānāṃ viṣayabhāvaḥ, karaṇantu siddhyanubandhī niyogasya, tacca yathāsvabhāvaṃ veditavyam /
GSP28prakp12u:82: svabhāvādhīnāhi sādhanānāṃa sādhakateti svabhāvabhede bhinna sādhakatā /
GSP28prakp12u:84: nanvevaṃ pratyekaṃ karaṇabhāvāśrayaṇe karaṇāntaranirapekṣāṇāṃ kimiti niyogasiddhihetutā na bhavati ? naivam /
GSP28prakp12u:86: tatra bahūni karaṇāni tasya śrūyanta iti, tathaiva tasya siddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp12u:94: ye punaryāgādīnāmapūrvañcāntarā bhāvanāṃ nānumanyante, teṣāṃ yāgādīnāṃ karaṇabhāvo durghaṭaḥ
GSP28prakp12u:99: 1367gauṇañca na karaṇam, na hi gauṇe mukhyadharmassambhavati /
GSP28prakp12u:100: ye 'pi1368 sarvākhyāteṣveva bhāvanābhidhānamāhuḥ, teṣāmapi matamasmabhyaṃ na rocate /
GSP28prakp12u:101: na hi kāryānabhidhāyipu laḍādiṣu bhāvanābhidhāne pramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp12u:107: yattu vyāpāramātravācidhātūccāraṇamātraṃ na kriyate, tatra tāvanmātrasyāpabhraṃśatvāt /
GSP28prakp12u:114: parispandātmā”ratho gacchatī”tyādiṣu laḍarthaḥ, tenācetane 'pi mukhya evalaḍartha iti /
GSP28prakp12u:115: dhātūnāmeva kriyāvācitvātprathamopanipātī vyāpāra eva dhātvartho 1371yuktaḥ, na jadhanyau saṃyoga-vibhāgau /
GSP28prakp12u:118: vibhāgaje 'pi vibhāge prayogānupalabdheḥ, na kevalasya saṃyogasya,
GSP28prakp12u:119: vibhāgasya vā gamivācyateti, kimanena manīṣikānimittena bālajalpitena
GSP28prakp12u:123: iti mahāmahopādhyāyaśrīmacchālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ viṣayakaraṇīyaṃ nāma dvādaśaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
